summary: "Killer Klowns from Outer Space" is a 1988 American sci-fi comedy horror movie about evil alien clowns who come to Earth to eat humans. It was made by the Chiodo Brothers and stars Grant Cramer and Suzanne Snyder. Filmed in California, it uses practical effects and has become a cult classic. Despite plans for sequels, none have been made yet. The story takes place in a small town where the clowns start capturing and killing people.
title: Killer Klowns from Outer Space
